ingredientStatus.title: Ingredient Status Guide
ingredientStatus.description: Ingredients in recipes are color-coded to help you understand their importance:

mandatory.label: Required (Green)
mandatory.description: Essential ingredients that cannot be omitted. The recipe won't work without them.

recommended.label: Recommended (Orange)
recommended.description: Important ingredients that significantly enhance flavor and quality.

optional.label: Optional (Gray)
optional.description: Nice-to-have ingredients that can be omitted or substituted based on preference.

ingredientStatus.usage: Use this guide when managing your pantry and viewing meal suggestions. Meals will only be suggested if you have all required (green) ingredients.

mealSuggestions.title: How Meal Suggestions Work
mealSuggestions.description: Get personalized meal recommendations based on your available ingredients and preferences:

steps.pantry: Add ingredients to your pantry to let us know what you have available
steps.mealType: Select your preferred meal type (breakfast, lunch, or dinner)
steps.kitchen: Choose your favorite cuisines from the kitchen preferences
steps.suggest: Tap 'Get Suggestions' to receive personalized meal recommendations

mealSuggestions.tips: Tip: The more ingredients you add to your pantry, the better your suggestions will be!

pantryManagement.title: Managing Your Pantry
pantryManagement.description: Your pantry helps us suggest meals based on what you actually have available:

features.search: Search for ingredients by name in both English and Arabic
features.categories: Browse ingredients by categories like grains, proteins, vegetables, etc.
features.status: See ingredient status indicators when viewing recipes
features.sync: Your pantry syncs across all your devices automatically

calendar.title: Calendar & Meal Planning
calendar.description: Plan your meals in advance and avoid repetition:

features.save: Save any meal to your calendar for future reference
features.plan: Plan meals for specific dates to organize your cooking schedule
features.avoid: The app automatically avoids suggesting meals you had recently
features.view: View your planned meals in an easy-to-read calendar format

recipeCreation.title: Creating & Sharing Recipes
recipeCreation.description: Share your favorite recipes with the Akelny community:

steps.basic: Fill in basic information like title, description, and cuisine type
steps.ingredients: Add ingredients with proper quantities and status indicators
steps.share: Choose to keep your recipe private or share it with the community
